item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, November 28, 2024 at 1:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Hetzner - New tariff structure for Cloud servers and Load balancers in the USA (55 points | 12 comments)
2. Show HN: myphotos.site – Google photos to a website in 60 seconds (39 points | 15 comments)
3. Malware can turn off webcam LED and record video, demonstrated on ThinkPad X230 (743 points | 413 comments)

10. Bananas: Cross-Platform screen sharing made simple (51 points | 9 comments)
11. Show HN: TeaTime – distributed book library powered by SQLite, IPFS and GitHub (213 points | 46 comments)
12. In Praise of Print: Reading Is Essential in an Era of Epistemological Collapse (101 points | 92 comments)
13. Developing a cancer drug without Big Pharma: this hospital shows it can be done (112 points | 60 comments)

15. The Forgotten Story of How IBM Invented the Automated Fab (114 points | 26 comments)

20. Shallow sports and deep social hierarchies: pecking orders aren't equal (14 points | 16 comments)
21. picoCAD – a tiny modeler for tiny models (126 points | 15 comments)
22. Show HN: App that asks ‘why?’ every time you unlock your phone (712 points | 346 comments)
23. Device-detector: Universal Device Detection library from User Agent (72 points | 26 comments)
24. Building a Phosphorescence Detector (17 points | 3 comments)
25. The Cosmos Teems with Complex Organic Molecules (10 points | 3 comments)
26. The Art and Mathematics of Genji-Ko (131 points | 7 comments)
27. Found in the wild: the first unkillable UEFI bootkit for Linux (5 points | discuss)

29. NASA aircraft uncover Cold War nuclear missile tunnels under Greenland ice sheet (61 points | 20 comments)
